contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish|Notre-Dame-de-Livoye}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Notre-Dame-de-Livaye |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Lisieux |canton = MÃ©zidon-Canon |INSEE = 14473 |postal code = 14340 |mayor = Germain Lambert |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Cambremer |longitude = 0.0414 |latitude = 49.1156 |elevation m = 20 |elevation min m = 19 |elevation max m = 96 |area km2 = 2.67 |population = 132 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Notre-Dame-de-Livaye}} '''Notre-Dame-de-Livaye''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|93 |1968|107 |1975|107 |1982|109 |1990|125 |1999|130 |2008|132 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Notredamedelivaye}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
